name: Herobrine's Huge House
description:
Welcome Finally To My New Game! I Had Enough To Make Baldi Games So I Decided To Make A Minecraft Horror Game! Enjoy!

Objectives: First Find A Yellow Key To Unlock The Bathroom! In The Bathroom Find A Green Key To Unlock The Outside Too! Outside Find A Gray Key To Go In The Basement And FINALLY In The Basement Find The Red Key To Escape Herobrine's Huge House!

GOOD LUCK! IF YOU BEAT IT I WILL GIVE YOU 10 DIAMONDS!
